<p>Gurgaon, officially named Gurugram, is a city located in the northern Indian state of Haryana. It is situated near the Delhi-Haryana border, about 30 kilometres (19 mi) southwest of the national capital New Delhi and 268 km (167 mi) south of Chandigarh, the state capital. <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Search?search=gurugram">Text from Wikipedia</a></p>
